episodes.title: SCIENTOLOGY EXPOSED: JENNA MISCAVIGE Shares The Truth About Scientology
episodes.description:
Jenna Miscavige grew up a member of Scientology's Sea Organization. Though she shares a last name with Scientology leader David Miscavige, that is where any similarities end. Jenna joins to share the truth about Scientology, what she had to do to escape, as well as what life is like today, after a cult.

JENNA MISCAVIGE
https://www.youtube.com/@JennaMiscavige

episodes.title: SCIENTOLOGY'S FEAR: MIRRIAM FRANCIS - SURVIVOR and Voice for the VOICELESS
episodes.description: Mirriam Francis experienced the worst type of abuse and trauma by the hand of her father, a Sea Organization member of the Church of Scientology. While Scientology continues to attempt to cover up this and other abuse, Mirriam Francis along with others SURVIVORS are now a voice for the voiceless.

episodes.title: ESCAPING SCIENTOLOGY: My Journey to FREEDOM
episodes.description: Leaving Scientology meant risking the loss of three generations of my family. Eventually, the threat to my well-being became even larger than the idea of loosing my family. This is how I escaped from the Sea Organization and eventually Scientology

episodes.title: SCIENTOLOGY LEAKS: Info On the Hollywood Testing Center, VEGAS CALL TO ACTION From SCIENTOLOGY SPY
episodes.description:
Our undercover, not so undercover SCIENTOLOGY SPY joins me to share what Scientology is telling parishioners about why the Hollywood Test Center is closed, and when it will open.
Plus, more information about Scientology front groups and a SCIENTOLOGY CALL TO ACTION in Vegas this weekend.

SHOW YOUR SUPPOR TO DIANE Our Fav Scientology Spy
https://www.youtube.com/@morefunthansittingathome

episodes.title: Truth About SCIENTOLOGY & LBGTQIA Community: SCIENTOLOGY Told Liz Ferris Her Dad Was DEAD
episodes.description:
What is SCIENTOLOGY'S real stance on homosexuality? Why did they lie to Liz Ferris and tell her that her dad was dead? In truth, he remains a member of he Sea Organization. 
Do celebrities in the LBGTQIA community get different treatment? Let's talk about it with Liz Ferris who bravely shares the horrific events that led to her breaking free from SCIENTOLOGY, and finding herself. 

LIZ FERRIS
https://www.youtube.com/@PokemonandCults

episodes.title: Inside SCIENTOLOGY's Mind Control: How FOOD and SLEEP Are Weaponized
episodes.description:
Shelby was training to be a course room supervisor in Clearwater Florida at the Scientology Flag Land Base. She shares how trainees were abused using sleep and food depravation, to control them behind closed doors.

#scientology #fraud #cultstories #whatisscientology #scientologyexplained #seaorganization

episodes.title: My ESCAPE from SCIENTOLOGY: Inside stories from a former member's daughter
episodes.description:
Shelby LaFreniere was born into Scientology as a third generation Scientologist. She is also my daughter. Shelby joins me to share her escape from Scientology, from her perspective. From the time I had to fly across the country to force the Sea Organization to let her leave when she was 14, to the time I had to send her out of the country to get her away from Scientology.
#scientology #fraud #cultstories #whatisscientology #scientologyexplained #seaorganization

episodes.title: Signing a Billion Year Contract: Part 5 of Scientology - Life After a Cult
episodes.description: Are you ready to embark on a journey through the inner workings of Scientology? Join us, Natalie and Lana, as we peel back the layers of our childhood spent within the confines Scientology. Our candid Friday episodes offer a glimpse from the dire realities of our past, into the community and connection we found outside of Scientology.As we unravel these layers, we touch on the profound repercussions of our time within Scientology, the effects that lingered even after our departure. Leaving wasn't easy, and dealing with PTSD, a bitter aftertaste of our past, was a challenge we had to navigate. But what we found was a sense of community and connection, a healing balm for our shared experiences. Shortlist Properties - Simplifying Real Estate Amplifying SuccessOur skilled Lake Minnetonka team specializes in real estate development, home transactions, and provides tailored services for Snowbirds and Property Management. Let us streamline your to-do list.https://www.shortlistproperties.com 612-523-0111Learn more at https://www.tonkatalk.com where we share more about our Lake Minnetonka community, including upcoming events and our take on local experiences.Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TonkaTalk/If you have feedback, questions, or suggestions of a future guests creating community and connection, email natalie@tonkatalk.com We appreciate your support in sharing Tonka Talk Community and Connection with someone you think could benefit from our content.

episodes.title: Fashion, Community, and the Power of Perseverance: A Tale of Primp Boutique Success
episodes.description: Imagine being 16, fuelled with a burning passion for fashion and a dream that seems larger than life. Meet Wesley Euthes, owner of the successful Primp Boutique, who transformed her love for fashion into a successful business.Her journey wasn't always a smooth ride, from her first job at Land's End to studying fashion in college and dealing with the harsh realities of post-graduation life. However, her tenacity led her to not only start her own venture but also revolutionize the retail experience with Primp, a boutique that blends affordability with the high-end experience. Wesley's story is a testament to the power of perseverance and a must-listen for those with an entrepreneurial spirit.But this episode isn't just about fashion and business success. It's about the crucial role of community and local businesses in building and fostering relationships. Using Primp as a prime example, we navigate how small businesses can create meaningful connections with their customers and support other local entities. Tune in for an episode that's as much about fashion and business as it is about community and hope.Learn more at https://www.tonkatalk.com where we share more about our Lake Minnetonka community, including upcoming events and our take on local experiences.Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TonkaTalk/If you have feedback, questions, or suggestions of a future guests creating community and connection, email natalie@tonkatalk.com We appreciate your support in sharing Tonka Talk Community and Connection with someone you think could benefit from our content.

episodes.title: Children in Scientology: Lake Minnetonka Safe Haven After Scientology Part 4
episodes.description: Welcome back to another riveting episode of Tonka Talk. Have you ever found yourself questioning the dynamics of a group you were a part of? Join the conversation with host Natalie Webster, as she continues the heart-wrenching tale of her experiences growing up in the Church of Scientology. Together with her sister Lana, they embark on a nostalgic journey that will make you laugh, cry, and gasp in disbelief.This episode promises to unravel the complex web of Scientology, its secretive organizations, and the life-altering experiences of those ensnared in it. From the shocking revelations of a teenage recruit coerced into signing a billion-year contract, to the devastating effects of a culture built on surveillance and reporting.Additionally, listen as we uncover how family bonds are tested when duty to an organization is prioritized over childhood.Join us as Natalie and Lana courageously delve into their therapeutic journey. They discuss the healing process and the power of open family communication. The importance of shared experiences is emphasized as Natalie encourages listeners to reach out with their questions or if they seek support. Join us on this emotional roller coaster as we unveil the harsh realities of life within the Church of Scientology. You won't want to miss it.Learn more at https://www.tonkatalk.com where we share more about our Lake Minnetonka community, including upcoming events and our take on local experiences.Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TonkaTalk/If you have feedback, questions, or suggestions of a future guests creating community and connection, email natalie@tonkatalk.com We appreciate your support in sharing Tonka Talk Community and Connection with someone you think could benefit from our content.

episodes.title: How My Grandpa Became My Dad: Lake Minnetonka Safe Haven After Scientology Part 3
episodes.description: I’d like to invite you on a personal journey - my journey - from the confines of a controlling cult to the warm embrace of a true community. The rabbit hole goes deeper this week as we navigate the impact of Scientology on family dynamics. With me, you'll get to know a family whose business was closely tied to my grandfather's teachings of the church, and witness how my upbringing was shaped by it. You'll also get a glimpse into my own unique family dynamic - from the tension stemming from my leaving Scientology, that led to my sister being excluded from our stepdad's funeral, to my mother's unconventional decision to marry her father-in-law. Well, buckle up, as I take you on this emotional rollercoaster ride through memories of a Disneyland trip, strong familial bonds, alcoholism, and ultimately, self-discovery.Learn more at https://www.tonkatalk.com where we share more about our Lake Minnetonka community, including upcoming events and our take on local experiences.Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TonkaTalk/If you have feedback, questions, or suggestions of a future guests creating community and connection, email natalie@tonkatalk.com We appreciate your support in sharing Tonka Talk Community and Connection with someone you think could benefit from our content.

episodes.title: The FBI and a Murder: Lake Minnetonka - Safe Haven After Scientology Part 2
episodes.description: What happens when a child's innocent hustle inadvertently brings the FBI to the Church of Scientology's doorstep? I lived it and I'm ready to share my story. This episode of Tonka Talk is a powerful testament to my journey of growing up in, and eventually escaping from, the Church of Scientology. Every moment was a life lesson, from my childhood in Hawaii spent selling drawings, to the dramatic incident that drastically changed my life—a mall shooting where I was forced to reassess my ties with the Church, risking the loss of my family.The impact Scientology had on my family dynamics was profound and complex. Join me, Natalie Webster, as I narrate my life-altering journey, shedding light on my experiences with Scientology, and the community I found in its aftermath. Stay tuned as I promise to delve deeper into my story in the coming weeks, releasing an episode each Friday.Learn more at https://www.tonkatalk.com where we share more about our Lake Minnetonka community, including upcoming events and our take on local experiences.Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TonkaTalk/If you have feedback, questions, or suggestions of a future guests creating community and connection, email natalie@tonkatalk.com We appreciate your support in sharing Tonka Talk Community and Connection with someone you think could benefit from our content.

episodes.title: The Mall Shooting - Lake Minnetonka: Safe Haven after Scientology Part 1
episodes.description: Ever escape a cult? I did, and I'm ready to share my story. In this episode of Tonka Talk, I share how I broke free from the gripping clutches of Scientology, with my entire family by my side. It's a journey filled with a myriad of emotions, where the final push came from a shooting at a Seattle mall. The following two years were challenging yet liberating, as the support from the Lake Minnetonka community became a beacon of hope in my life.I found solace, understanding, and acceptance in writing for the Lakeshore Weekly, competing in the Mrs Minnesota International Pageant, and volunteering with the Excelsior Fire Department and the Red Cross. The journey may have been tough, but the community made it bearable.But it doesn't stop there; community and connection continued to play a pivotal role in my life post-Scientology. A violent crime was the initiator to my involvement in Scientology, and ironically it was also the catalyst to my departure. The power of community and connection that I discovered in Lake Minnetonka debunked the indoctrinated idea that only Scientologists could truly help people. I encourage you to be a part of this enlightening conversation and join our TonkaTalk community. I'm eager to hear your stories of finding your own sense of belonging. Let's create a space where we don't just fit in but also thrive, grow, and learn. So, hit that subscribe button and don't hesitate to reach out to us on social media. We're all just puzzle pieces looking for where we fit in, right?Learn more at https://www.tonkatalk.com where we share more about our Lake Minnetonka community, including upcoming events and our take on local experiences.Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TonkaTalk/If you have feedback, questions, or suggestions of a future guests creating community and connection, email natalie@tonkatalk.com We appreciate your support in sharing Tonka Talk Community and Connection with someone you think could benefit from our content.
